title: Liquid Level
description: copyright 2016-2017, 2019 Open Connectivity Foundation, Inc. All rights reserved.

liquid.level_currentlevel.description: The current level of the liquid in percentage.

liquid.level_desiredlevel.description: The desired level of the liquid in percentage.

liquid.level_step.description: Step value across the defined range when the range is an integer.  This is the increment for valid values across the range; so if range is 0..10 and step is 2 then valid values are 0,2,4,6,8,10.
